basics.name: Abby Gottlich
basics.label: Developer, Designer
basics.summary: Developer-Designer Hybrid, Seeking a Job that Allows Me to do Both

work.summary: Worked directly with senior level developers and UX Designers to program a multi-faceted web application, completing tasks to meet client goals.
highlights: Used HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and AngularJS
In charge of all styling for new user flow built from scratch
Practiced an agile work environment through sprint planning

work.summary: Developed brand identities for new and existing companies.
highlights: Worked hand-in-hand with the developer to create an effective online presence to meet client goals
Enhanced the online presence of clients in the form of social media graphics, utilizing Photoshop and Illustrator
Successfully promoted client events through poster and billboard design, utilizing InDesign, and incorporating hand-drawn illustrations

work.summary: Successfully transformed a dated, disorganized website into an intuitive, modern Content Management System.
highlights: Utilized information architecture, card sorting, and communication skills
Trained all teachers and staff members to edit/manage their own personal webpage
Engaged the community in the Districtâ€™s strengthened online social media presence by photographing all school events

work.summary: Obtained design skills and an understanding of creative direction by designing special collateral for office functions.
highlights: Gained skills in communication and collaboration through daily team meetings and regularly reporting to the Creative Director

projects.name: Feast Finder
highlights: Built with React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose
